_sText:
Hi all
--------

first the install:
--------------------

put the castle_mb_crusty73_v8.bsp and the castle_mb_crusty73_v8.nav
file in in yourthe following directory:
\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\yoursteamaccount\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps
start the game and will shown in the create server window 

about the map
---------------------
this is a castle in aarburg (switzerland)
i rebuildet for css 
maximum 60 players
better are only 40 players
this map have not too many details but running fast!
this castle survifed 5 wars and it never have been took over (since now ! well i guess)
no animals hat been hurt by dooing this map!!!
if someone gonna run this map on a server please send me the IP at my e_mail 
crusty73@gmx.ch


changes since the last version:
----------------------------------------------

the fireplace leak is fixt
the t spawn is fixt (no one get stuck in the wall) ;-)
the radar shows the the names off the place where you are
the block on the tower has been removed
the shiddy mountains are new
hint brushes had been set (doubled the performence of the map!)
nodrow textures has been set on the outside of the map 
the ct`s have it easyer now (more boxes to hide)
the trees having leaves now
a birt flys
and the hostages do not get stuck on the wall

feel free to send me a mail, with idea, or suguestions 

so have fun greetings crusty

PS: sorry about my bad english webmaster !
